propertydef.name: depthActual
propertydef.label: Actual Depth
propertydef.description: The actual depth of the drill hole.

propertydef.name: nameActual
propertydef.label: Actual Name
propertydef.description: The actual name of the drill hole.

propertydef.name: blastActual
propertydef.label: Actual Blast
propertydef.description: The blast the hole was actually drilled for.

propertydef.name: patternActual
propertydef.label: Actual Pattern
propertydef.description: The pattern the hole was actually a part of.

propertydef.name: depthDesign
propertydef.label: Design Depth
propertydef.description: The depth of the drill hole according to the design.

propertydef.name: nameDesign
propertydef.label: Design Name
propertydef.description: The name of the drill hole according to the design.

propertydef.name: blastDesign
propertydef.label: Design Blast
propertydef.description: The blast the hole was designed to be drilled for.

propertydef.name: patternDesign
propertydef.label: Design Pattern
propertydef.description: The pattern the drill hole was designed to be a part of.

propertydef.name: holeType
propertydef.label: Hole Type
propertydef.description: The type of the drill hole.
